name: Zolurk's maze
description:
Find a way to activate the portal to escape the maze, the maze might change from time to time depending on where you are going.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Shift to sprint.

Space to jump.

E to interact withobjects(only if it shows you are able to).

A game I made in 2019. This is the first "Finished" game I've made.
